title: Vasantika Kundan Nakshi Haaram - A Touch of Timeless Elegance
materials: 22K Gold Plated Alloy. Features high-quality Kundan settings with synthetic coral cabochons and shimmering Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Hyderabadi Polish applied for a lasting
features: This stunning Haaram showcases a fusion of modern and traditional design. The intricate Kundan settings, meticulously handcrafted, surround vibrant synthetic coral cabochons and sparkling CZ stones. The central pendant features a floral motif and a heart-shaped drop, embellished with CZ's, adding a contemporary touch to the classic Haaram silhouette. Nakshi-inspired detailing enhances the overall aesthetic, adding depth and texture.
colors: accentuated by the warm hues of the synthetic Coral and the brilliance of the White CZ stones. A harmonious and eye-catching color palette.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi
and even upscale social gatherings where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for a modern twist on traditional attire during Seemantham or Half-Saree functions.
description: A beautiful blend of tradition and contemporary style, this Haaram is a true masterpiece. The handcrafted Kundan work reflects the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry, while the modern design elements make it versatile for various occasions. The high-quality materials ensure durability and a lasting shine. It's an investment piece that you will treasure for years to come.
